title: Short-Term Course for Enhancing Medical History-Taking Competencies Using Virtual Patient Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Measuring practical skills through self-directed learning using digital devices and simulated OSCE (Objective Structured Clinical Examination) assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically elicit medical histories related to three or more common symptoms through virtual patient simulations
Improvement of history-taking performance in internal medicine and surgery by over 20% in simulated OSCE evaluations
Enhancement of medical history-taking confidence by over 80% through self-assessment and feedback processes using digital platforms
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
